abstract: A platform collapse on the set of the latest installment in the "Resident Evil" franchise has resulted in injuries to 16 actors portraying zombies.
snippet: A platform collapse on the set of the latest installment in the "Resident Evil" franchise has resulted in injuries to 16 actors portraying zombies.
lead_paragraph: It's apparently a bad week to be producing a motion picture about the living dead. After what may or may not have been a weapons raid on the Brad Pitt zombie movie, "World War Z," a platform collapse in Canada on the set of the latest installment in the "Resident Evil" series has resulted in injuries to 16 actors portraying zombies, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: No Major Zombie Injuries After Accident on Film Shoot
